title: AI-Powered Customer Service Chatbot
description: Built an intelligent chatbot using GPT-4 and fine-tuned models for automated customer support
longDescription: Developed a sophisticated AI chatbot system that handles 10,000+ customer queries daily with 95% accuracy. Implemented natural language understanding, context management, and seamless handoff to human agents when needed.

title: Real-Time Analytics Dashboard
description: Scalable real-time data visualization platform processing millions of events per day
longDescription: Created a high-performance analytics dashboard that processes and visualizes streaming data in real-time. Built with modern tech stack ensuring low latency and high availability.

title: Computer Vision Quality Control System
description: Automated quality inspection system using deep learning for manufacturing
longDescription: Developed an end-to-end computer vision solution for automated quality control in manufacturing. The system detects defects with 98% accuracy, reducing manual inspection time by 90%.
